net.proteusframework.core.html

Interface MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MarkupValidatorClient.HTMLValidationRequest, MarkupValidatorClient.URLValidationRequest
    Enclosing class:
    MarkupValidatorClient

    public static interface MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationRequest
    Validator request..
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getContextInformation()
      Get context information to include with validation results.
      Object getData()
      Get the HTML data as a URL or CharSequence.
      Doctype getDoctype()
      Get the doctype.
      Function<MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationResult,MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationResult> getValidationResultTransformer()
      Get a validation result transform function.
      boolean isDirectInput()
      Test if the request is for direct input.
      boolean isDocument()
      Test if the request represents a document or a document fragment.
      boolean isPreferInternal()
      Test if the request would prefer using an internal validator.
      boolean isXML()
      Indicates if the content for direct input is XML.

    • Method Detail

      • getContextInformation

        String getContextInformation()
        Get context information to include with validation results.
        Returns:
        the context information or null.

      • getData

        Object getData()
        Get the HTML data as a URL or CharSequence.
        Returns:
        the data.

      • getDoctype

        Doctype getDoctype()
        Get the doctype.
        Returns:
        the doctype. May be null.

      • getValidationResultTransformer

        Function<MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationResult,MarkupValidatorClient.ValidationResult> getValidationResultTransformer()
        Get a validation result transform function.

        The function may return null to discard a result.

        Returns:
        the function. May be null.

      • isDirectInput

        boolean isDirectInput()
        Test if the request is for direct input.
        Returns:
        true indicates the request contains the HTML; false indicates the request has a URL to retrieve the HTML.

      • isDocument

        boolean isDocument()
        Test if the request represents a document or a document fragment. If a fragment, isDirectInput() must return true.
        Returns:
        true for a document; false for a document fragment.

      • isPreferInternal

        boolean isPreferInternal()
        Test if the request would prefer using an internal validator. The default is true.
        Returns:
        true or false.

      • isXML

        boolean isXML()
        Indicates if the content for direct input is XML. Ignored if validating a URL since the content type will indicate.
        Returns:
        true or false.
